Choose one of the following: BOT121, or BIO114.

Required in Major or Support; also satisfies General Education (GE) requirement.

classes.cCustomCardTitle: Select two courses from the following
classes.cCustomNote: Select two courses from the following: BIO227, BRAE337, SS120, STAT217, or STAT218.

classes.cCustomCardTitle: Select two courses from the following
classes.cCustomNote: Select two courses from the following: BIO227, BRAE337, SS120, STAT217, or STAT218.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, Upper-Division B, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1, D2, Upper-Division D, and F. Upper-Division B, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, and Upper-Division D should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: Upper-Division B, Upper-Division C, D1, D2, Upper-Division D, or E.
